title: Fawn and the Mysterious Trickster
description: Fawn is the best prankster in all of Pixie Hollow. Then her friend Beck plays a trick of her own that spooks the fairy dust off Fawn. Soon the two fairies in an all-out practical joke battle! Prank follows prank until one night someone turns all the furniture in Fawn’s room upside down. And Beck swears it wasn’t her! But if Beck didn’t do it...then who did? Is there another trickster in the Home Tree?
author: Laura Driscoll
